name: photo-of-the-day-november-14-2008
title: Photo Of The Day: November 14, 2008 [Feel Good Friday]
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
Ben Folds and his kids, Gracie and Louie, were spotted by Flickr user Alexa Sullivant near SATCo on Election Day. And what Nashvillian doesn’t love Ben Folds, right?

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
